author: wyattjoh
message:
fix: fixes double encoded parameters when deployed to Vercel (#77095)

When resolving routes during partial prerendering, the parameters that
are added as query parameters can be double encoded. This fixes it so
that the query parameters are decoded before being assigned to the
`queryParams` object used for parsing the path parameters from.

Fixes #71005
